![](https://pumpcloud.net/templates/six/img/logo.png)

Dear LET members,

We are Pump Cloud from Pump Networks Limited.

We're sorry that we're late. But we finally made it!

Finally, we successfully launched. We decide to give you a 10% lifetime discount on all our VPS products.

Please use coupon: **LAUNCH** (available on the first 20 orders)

Our LEB KVM plan:

1 vCPU Core
<br>512MB RAM
<br>25GB RAID-10 HDD Storage
<br>400GB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps Uplink
<br>1 IPv4 Address
<br>$5.99/Mo (**$5.39/Mo** using coupon "LAUNCH")

Order link: https://pumpcloud.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=2

Additional IPs can be requested @ $1/IP/Mo.
<br>Reverse DNS can be requested via ticket.

**Payment methods:** We accept PayPal, Credit Card*, Alipay* and Bitcoin*!

For test IPs please send me a PM or open a ticket.

Thanks!

*via Stripe.
